greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: T(n,k) = number of n X k 0..4 arrays with values 0..4 introduced in row major order and no element equal to any horizontal or vertical neighbor.
comment: Number of colorings of the grid graph P_n X P_k using a maximum of 5 colors up to permutation of the colors. - _Andrew Howroyd_, Jun 26 2017
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..378 (terms 1..127 from R. H. Hardin)
example: Some solutions with values 0 to 4 for n=6, k=4:
xref: Cf. A207997 (3 colorings), A198715 (4 colorings), A222144 (labeled 5 colorings), A198982 (6 colorings), A198723 (7 colorings), A198914 (8 colorings), A207868 (unlimited).
results.author: _R. H. Hardin_, Oct 31 2011
